name: RippleWave
description:
Hodl RIPPLE Wave and earn XRP. RIPPLE Wave the New Meme Coin BEP20 that rewards holders with Ripple XRP Automatically.
10% XRP rewards.
RIPPLE Wave believes in the future of RIPPLE and wants to make itself available to further increase the volumes on XRP.
If you buy RIPPLE Wave you will receive rewards in XRP in the amount of 10% of all transactions proportionally to the size of your RIPPLE Wave balance contained in your wallet.
Buy, hold, shill ... earn Ripple/XRP
